meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gillian DiPietro Logan Schultz Jan Zasowski Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6259.

td.p: Gillian DiPietro, a law student from Brooklyn, New York
Logan Schultz, a bank examiner from Lexington, Kentucky
Jan Zasowski, a stock trader from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,801)

tr.td: WEE FOLK
FURNITURE
BRIT SPEAK
DANCE!
ABOUT THE STATES
"IGGY" POP

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In a Grimm tale the Miller\'s daughter gave this little man a necklace & a ring for spinning straw into gold for her')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In a Grimm tale the Miller's daughter gave this little man a necklace & a ring for spinning straw into gold for her

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Logan: What is a day bed?)
(Gillian: What is a cabin bed?)
...
(Alex: Logan, did you know that?)
(Logan: I did. After I--)
(Alex: Afterwards, yes. After your incorrect response. Go again. Three clues left.)

a trundle

LoganGillian
Triple Stumper
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
